author: Joseph Garcia
title: Kentucky and southern Indiana power outages: What we know | whas11.com
text: LOUISVILLE, Ky. — Thousands of people are without power across Kentucky and southern Indiana after a powerful line of thunderstorms moved through the region Thursday afternoon. Over 2,000 [LG&E](https://stormcenter.lge-ku.com/) customers in Kentucky are without power as of 7 p.m. Friday. The majority of the outages are located in Jefferson County. [Duke Energy ](https://outagemaps.duke-energy.com/#/current-outages/in)reports more than 190 customers are without power across Indiana as of 2 p.m. on Friday. Crews with both energy companies are working to restore power to people as fast a possible, however it's unclear when power will be fully restored. Remember! Avoid downed power lines. Treat them as if they are still active and call your local power company immediately. LIVE RADAR This story will be updated as more information becomes available. Make it easy to keep up-to-date with more stories like this. Download the WHAS11 News app now. For [Apple](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/whas11-news-louisville/id1453184391?ls=1&mt=8) or [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.doapps.android.mln.MLN_b3ff766402d6d975200b86a42ea504b0) users. Have a news tip? Email [assign@whas11.com](mailto:assign@whas11.com), visit our [Facebook page](http://www.facebook.com/whas11) or [Twitter feed](https://twitter.com/whas11).

author: globo.com
title: Prefeitura de São Miguel dos Campos abre processo seletivo para profissionais da Educação | Alagoas | G1
text:
A Prefeitura de São Miguel dos Campos , no interior de Alagoas, abriu nesta quinta-feira (5) as inscrições para o Processo Seletivo Simplificado (PSS) para formação de cadastro de reserva de profissionais da área da educação.
Compartilhe no WhatsApp Compartilhe no Telegram
No cadastro de reserva, os aprovados fazem parte de uma lista de espera e são convocados quando surgem vagas.
As inscrições devem ser feitas até o dia 11 de dezembro, no site https://saomigueldoscampos.al.gov.br .
VEJA O EDITAL
Cargos, salários e jornadas de trabalho

author: Aly
title: Swing Into Action: Discovering the Finest Mini Golf Courses in London
text:
Welcome to the most fascinating mini golf courses in the heart of London. Get ready to explore the magical world of mini golf in this amazing city, discovering the most interesting and well-designed venues. A diversity of themes is there for everyone to encounter them. This journey definitely promises to lead every individual to an unexpected and unforgettable experience full of joy, happiness and a competitive spirit. Join us in this adventure and prepare yourselves to come across with lively indoor and outdoor crazy golf and games.
1. Escape from daily anxiety
First and foremost, one of the main benefits of mini golf clubs in London is that there is the possibility of a quick
escape from the daily worries and the stress. The pressure of the city may cause serious problems on the ultimate well-being. Mini golf centres have the privilege of setting a world where time seems to flow in a slow way and every kind of concern takes a backseat in people’s minds. Due to the full concentration on the moment of playing , an instant relief takes place and this gives everyone the chance to relax and enjoy the present. Tranquility and adrenaline join forces and an ideal environment for the rejuvenation of wellness is fostered.
2. Mini golf tournaments and events
If you make a simple search using the following words “
crazy golf with plonkgolf.co.uk”, you will get informed about a range of tournaments and events that are held throughout the year. For someone who seeks a competitive edge, these events constitute the perfect option. In particular, tournaments’ organisers set challenging games providing the competitors with the luck of showing and developing their skills against each other. Enthusiasts can exchange experiences and even make new friendships. Without any doubt, these events play a significant role in people’s socialisation and they enhance a sense of community among individuals.
3. Educational dimension of mini golf courses
Furthermore, immersing yourselves in mini golf experience gives a more profound meaning in the field of education and learning. This happens because as the players explore a diversity of themed courses, they are able to understand the space around them better. Every spot represents a story or an important incident and this encourages individuals to investigate hidden aspects. Moreover, the players are supposed to face plenty of obstacles and in order for them to get over every difficulty, it is necessary to use their mind and apply alternative strategies and smart techniques. As a result, the competitors feel alert and energetic during the games. Levels of adrenaline rise, too. The outcome is the transformation of a simple game into an exciting experience.
All in all,
London’s mini golf courses offer numerous possibilities for extraordinary activities. A diverse range of scenery and landscapes await you to try them. Beyond any doubt, these courses cater to all wishes and ages. So, when you are in London, swing into action and you will gain tremendous profits.

author: @infoitinterno
title: Ciclone della Befana, neve e piogge in arrivo sull'Italia
text:
Ciclone della Befana, neve e piogge in arrivo sull'Italia
Articolo Precedente
Articolo Successivo
Il lungo fine settimana dell'Epifania, che si estende dal 4 al 6 gennaio, sarà caratterizzato da condizioni meteorologiche incerte e molto nuvolose su tutta l'Italia, con piogge sparse e freddo intenso. Tuttavia, le nevicate abbondanti interesseranno principalmente le zone di alta quota. Durante la settimana, è previsto l'arrivo di un'ondata di freddo polare, che abbasserà la quota neve fino alle zone collinari.
Secondo Antonio Sanò, fondatore del sito iLMeteo.it, la prima perturbazione dell'anno, diretta dalla Romagna verso il Sud Italia, è già in transito. Questo fronte, collegato a una vasta area di bassa pressione polare centrata sul Mar Baltico, porterà precipitazioni tra Romagna, Marche, Toscana e Lazio, per poi spingersi verso le restanti regioni del Centro e tra Campania e Basilicata.
Il 2025 si apre con l'influenza delle correnti nord atlantiche, che porteranno piogge e perturbazioni in transito sull'Italia. Nelle prossime ore, il fronte perturbato raggiungerà il Nord Italia, determinando un venerdì instabile sulla provincia di Rimini, con piogge e rovesci sin dal mattino.
Il ciclone della Befana, atteso per il fine settimana, porterà un miglioramento temporaneo delle condizioni meteorologiche, con più sole, ma sarà seguito da un nuovo peggioramento.
